LanguageData.HasAutomatedTurrets_Disapproved.stages.a: We use automated turrets. It's really ugly to give life-and-death decision to a machine.
LanguageData.HasAutomatedTurrets_Horrible.stages.auto: We use automated turrets. It's horrible to give life-and-death decisions to a machine.
LanguageData.HasAutomatedTurrets_Prohibited.stages.au: We use automated turrets. It's absolutely abhorrent to give life-and-death decisions to a machine.
